QuestData.Title: Welcome to the Jungle
QuestData.Description: Welcome to Stranglethorn!$b$bPerhaps you're not aware of this, but that dwarf over there is the son of the one and only Hemet Nesingwary, renowned war hero of the Alliance and master big game hunter. Like his father, he's not one for welcoming strangers into his camp, but you look like you've seen quite a bit of action in your day, $c.$b$bGo and speak with him. He's a chip off the old block, so perhaps he can give you some hunting pointers.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Hemet Nesingwary Jr. at Nesingwary's Expedition in Northern Stranglethorn.
QuestData.RewardText: Jolly nice to make your acquaintance, $n. Haven't seen a $c around these parts for some time.$b$bI've one purpose in being here: to hunt a great and elusive beast. Seeing that you're a hero of sorts I am willing to let you take part in the hunt, but you must first prove yourself.$b$bI shall teach the ways of raptor killing to you. Ajeck will train you with tiger hunting. And Sir Erlgadin is a master of panther tracking.$b$bProve your skill and I'll let you in on the big hunt.
